caption:
61 years ago today, history was made! 🏆 On April 13, 1964, Sidney Poitier became the first Black actor to win the Academy Award for Best Actor, for his unforgettable role as Homer Smith in Lilies of the Field.⁠
⁠
This win wasn’t just a personal victory, it broke barriers in an industry that had long refused to recognize Black talent. He paved the way for generations of Black actors to follow. 👏🏾 #BlackExcellence #BlackHistory⁠
⁠
Follow @officialblackwallstreet for more Black excellence and Black-owned businesses.
